channel.title: Comments on: RETRO: Sisters of Mercy “Black Planet” video

item.title: By: Babe
item.dc:creator: Babe
item.description: I can't tell if you're for real or not.... classic video for Black Planet ? The only things TSOM about this is the music.
item.content:encoded: I can’t tell if you’re for real or not…. classic video for Black Planet ? The only things TSOM about this is the music.

item.title: By: d.
item.dc:creator: d.
item.description: Lurve it. SOM has been in HEAVY rotation in the 'ru to and from work lately. Gets me in the mood to write some kick-ass plant copy for some reason.
item.content:encoded: Lurve it. SOM has been in HEAVY rotation in the ‘ru to and from work lately. Gets me in the mood to write some kick-ass plant copy for some reason.
